entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
